message.content:
cs.LG, cs.AI, cs.CV, cs.NE, cs.CL. 

The paper proposes a novel gradient boosting framework using shallow neural networks as weak learners, which is a common topic in machine learning and artificial intelligence (cs.LG, cs.AI). The framework is applied to classification, regression, and learning to rank tasks, which are common in computer vision (cs.CV), natural language processing (cs.CL), and neural networks (cs.NE). Therefore, the most likely sub-categories are cs.LG, cs.AI, and cs.CV, followed by cs.NE and cs.CL.
